content: Investments PhillipCapital (POEMS) Asked by JingYing TanAsked on 27 Apr 2019If you need a CDP account to trade and hold SGx’s stocks in SG Market. then what do you call an accounted created with POEMS2.0, do I still hold the stocks at the end of the day after buying it? 1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Ang Yee Gary, Medicine at National University Of SingaporeLevel 4. ProdigyUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Poems has several type of account
If they did not ask u to open cdp or link cdp then it should be a custodian account.
Please kindly check with them.3 comments2

See all 3 comments Ang Yee Gary27 Apr 2019Https://www.poems.com.sg/account-types/cash-prepaid-account/introduction/

Yes it is a custodian account and you must both buy and sell thru them.
Can you kindly up vote my replyJTJingYing Tan27 Apr 2019Thank you! :-) np, that’s the least i can do
